archdesc.bioghist: Raisin Township, Lenawee County, Michigan family.
archdesc.scopecontent: Genealogy with brief biographical notes; correspondence, 1852-1865, of Obadiah Rogers and other family members; notebook, 1831-1859, of Obadiah Rogers with comments on settling and farming near Tecumseh, Michigan; excerpts from diary, 1871-1889, of Samuel Reed Rogers, commenting on life as Lenawee County farmer (typescript); letters, 1884-1895, received by Fred S. Rogers, from his uncle C.G. Foster, U.S. District Court judge in Topeka, Kansas, concerning legal clerking, homestead claims, and the opening
